About
I am a Computer Science student at Graphic Era Hill University. I am passionate about software development, web technologies, and open-source. I enjoy learning new things and working on projects that challenge me to grow as a developer. I am always looking for opportunities to collaborate on interesting projects and connect with like-minded individuals. In my free time, I like to read books, watch movies, and play video games.
